ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: Sweet! %s is beckoning her child over!
%s is amazing! Look how wide its mouth is gaping!
Oh, no! %s looks frightening to me!
Oh, look! %s is trying to stand on two legs!
Cool! %s is rolling in the snow!
Hear that?! %s is growling for attention!
Oh, snap! %s is trying to escape from its exhibit!
Uh oh, %s is checking if its fence is electrified
Oh no! That fence shocked %s a little bit!
